thread.title: Free WiFi for conference guests and visitors to York
thread.title_full: Free WiFi for conference guests and visitors to York

author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: Free WiFi for conference guests and visitors to York
text:
Free WiFi for conference guests and visitors to York Free WiFi for conference guests and visitors to York Details Category: Venues & Events   12:30 The City of York has announced that visitors and conference guests now have access to free WiFi at the University of York and across the city. This is part of a nationwide scheme spanning 22 cities, funded by the Department of Culture, Media and Sport (DCMA). 
The free internet service CityConnectWiFi can be accessed from any wireless enabled device and has been designed to provide a fast and secure user experience. Although we have had free WiFi for some time, this is quicker and simpler than ever. Cllr James Alexander, leader of City of York Council said: "Having access to free WiFi is essential for a thriving business community in today's marketplace. The network will also prove an invaluable resource in supporting the council's work to further understand and monitor how the city centre is used in order for the city to prosper and grow".
